Key Match Events: Lauri Markkanen led the way for Utah with 24 points
Collin Sexton has given the Jazz a boost in the second half
Post-Match Reflections: The Utah Jazz kept it close with the Phoenix Suns in Footprint Center on Saturday but ultimately came up a bit short in a 114-106 loss.
The Jazz will return to Delta Center for a two-game homestand to host the Nets and the Hornets.
